ClassDesc: Use @B_android#support#design#widget#CoordinatorLayout#AttachedBehavior_E@ instead Defines the default @B_android#support#design#widget#CoordinatorLayout#Behavior_E@ of a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#View_E@ class. When writing a custom view, use this annotation to define the default behavior when used as a direct child of an @B_android#support#design#widget#CoordinatorLayout_E@. The default behavior can be overridden using @B_android#support#design#widget#CoordinatorLayout#LayoutParams#setBehavior_E@. Example: @DefaultBehavior(MyBehavior.class)
